name: Elegant Stiletto Heels
description: Sophisticated high-heeled stilettos with a sleek design, perfect for formal occasions or a stylish night out.

name: Chic Block Heel Sandals
description: Comfortable yet trendy block heel sandals, ideal for casual elegance and all-day wear.

name: Classic Pointed-Toe Pumps
description: Timeless pointed-toe pumps that add a touch of sophistication to any outfit, perfect for office or evening wear.

name: Strappy Evening Heels
description: Glamorous strappy heels designed to elevate your evening look with a touch of sparkle and elegance.

name: Modern Wedge Heels
description: Stylish wedge heels offering both comfort and height, perfect for a chic daytime or evening ensemble.
